name: React + Tauri + Rust Desktop App
description: Complete blueprint for building a React/Tauri/Rust desktop application with type-safe IPC communication, Chakra UI v3, file operations, and real-time file watching

tasks.description: Initialize Tauri project with React, TypeScript, Vite, and configure all build tools
Complete Rust backend with modules, main entry point, and command handlers
Complete React frontend setup with Chakra UI v3 theme, routing, and context providers
Type-safe IPC layer with TypeScript wrapper functions matching Rust commands
File system watching with notify crate and Tauri event emission
Complete UI component structure with pages, navigation, and feature components
